mapper.update: UPDATE restaurants SET city = SUBSTRING_INDEX(address, ' ', 1), district = SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(address, ' ', 2), ' ', -1), neighborhood = SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(address, ' ', 3), ' ', -1), detail_addr = TRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(address, '^[^ ]+ [^ ]+ [^ ]+ ', '')), -- 세종특별자치시에 대해 특별한 처리를 위한 조건 city = CASE WHEN address LIKE '%세종특별자치시%' THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(address, ' ', 1) ELSE city END, district = CASE WHEN address LIKE '%세종특별자치시%' THEN NULL ELSE district END, neighborhood = CASE WHEN address LIKE '%세종특별자치시%' THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(address, ' ', 2), ' ', -1) ELSE neighborhood END, detail_addr = CASE WHEN address LIKE '%세종특별자치시%' THEN TRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(address, '^[^ ]+ [^ ]+ ', '')) ELSE detail_addr END

UPDATE restaurants SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, food_type = #{foodType}, parking_available = #{parkingAvailable}, total_seats = #{totalSeats} WHERE restaurant_id = #{restaurantId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM menus WHERE menu_id = #{menuId} AND restaurant_id = #{restaurantId}
DELETE FROM restaurant_images WHERE image_id = #{imageId} AND restaurant_id = #{restaurantId}
